Name: TheWandererVR
About the game: Simple VR Archery shooting game. Defend yourself against the oncoming enemies with arrows. In addition to the basic arrows, use two types of Trap Arrows. Take advantage of Scope to easily kill distant enemies. Defend your ranged attacks with shields. Finally defend your stronghold with enemy attacks. (Watch out for hidden enemies.)

Meta Description: Looking for information on TheWandererVR? Check out the release date (Feb 19, 2020), developer insights from TheGoo, and a complete game summary.
